devices_included: Any screen device; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Tablet
contribution_desc: Tutorial for using MDEs (tabletop and other devices) for installations in hospitals to "foster emotional intelligence"
connection_classification: Via remote server; Local master device
crossdevice_def: "MDE have been object of much previous research. Traditionally, their main purpose was enlarging the visualization space via the physical union of several smaller screens (e.g. [8]), and the interaction played a more secondary role, therefore leading to monouser environments with difficulties to favor collaboration, which is fundamental in emotional learning."
